content.raw:
+1 to exposing parameters

As for trying with a simpler mesh, I think we can get one on the model database. I used the duck as the example because it was also used on Ignition Rendering.

I'll just point out that the same duck meshes have good RTF on Gazebo 9, probably because of the default parameters there:

![ducks-gz9.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/3243882022-ducks-gz9.gif)
content.html:
+1 to exposing parameters

As for trying with a simpler mesh, I think we can get one on the model database. I used the duck as the example because it was also used on Ignition Rendering.

I'll just point out that the same duck meshes have good RTF on Gazebo 9, probably because of the default parameters there:
